pr_title: mgmt, change Scheduler in SdkContext to parallel

timeline.message: change Scheduler in SdkContext to parallel (default)

timeline.bodyText:
Previously it is RxJava Scheduler.io() http://reactivex.io/RxJava/2.x/javadoc/io/reactivex/schedulers/Schedulers.html#io--
Reactor no long have this.
Since now azure-core is all async without blocking, I think we can change this to default parallel Scheduler.
timeline.author: weidongxu-microsoft
